[ library(constraint_pools) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

set_typed_pool_constraints(+Pool, +Type, +Constraints)

Replace the stored constraints for type Type
Pool
Atom
Type
Integer
Constraints
List of callable Terms

Description

The constraint store of pool Pool for type Type is forgotten and replaced with the list of constraints Constraints. This modification is backtrackable.

Examples

See Also

collect_typed_pool_constraints / 3, get_typed_pool_constraints / 3
